# INSpeakableStringResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for a speakable string object associated with an intent.

## Declaration

```swift
class INSpeakableStringResolutionResult
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSpeakableStringResolutionResult] object is what you return when resolving parameters containing an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSpeakableString] object. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to successfully resolve the parameter.

For additional resolution options, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.
- **disambiguation(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.

## Strings

- **INStringResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a string value associated with an intent.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
